location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 9/21 Persian navy: activities and visits to Arab ports'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order, from the front to the rear.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4, these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence from the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf to the Political Agent, Muscat. The papers warn of possible visits by Iranian sloops and give reference to previous correspondence (see IOR/R/15/6/319) on what action to take if such visits occur.
